_header: I am he that hath you daily served
_description: Fragment of a love song — four lines

BLAdd5465.First Lines: I am he that hath you dayly servyd…
BLAdd5465.Note:
With music in three voices credited to Edmund Turges but that only the
                    beginning of two voices survives.
BLAdd5465.Editions:
Fehr,  Bernhard. 
             “Die Lieder des Fairfax MS (Add. 5465 Brit. Mus.).” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         106 (1901): 48-70: 55.
Stevens,  John,
                        ed.  
             Music and Poetry in the Early Tudor Court.
         London: Methuen, 1961: 358.
